pageContext.claim: “Just last week, Sleepy Joe proudly accepted the endorsement of the pro-criminal, anti-police Portland district attorney, who has a policy of releasing rioters, vandals, criminals, and violent extremists without charge.”
pageContext.analysis: Multnomah County District Attorney Mike Schmidt dismissed charges against roughly half of the 600 people arrested during the summer’s racial justice protests. Schmidt has also said that he would decline to prosecute minor offenses against demonstrators. That is not the same as failing to charge "violent extremists."
